about_the_game:
This is Paint Warfare's biggest and most epic bundle of skins and rewards in a single DLC

You get:

  • The OG Banana Costume (customisable with your own hats)
  • Large Australian Bucket Hat
  • Permanent Double XP for EVERYONE including you in your lobby
  • Red and Black player name colors
  • Exclusive carbon-fibre weapon skin for the:
    • AK
    • Falcon
    • ACR
    • Launcher
    • Frenzy
    • Banana Gun
  • This DLC has been updated multiple times with even more features. By buying this DLC you own it forever, and that means you get all future perks with it too!


*TIP: The permanent double XP boost will also stack with the triple XP boost in the Shop. This means that if you have this DLC, and then activate a triple XP boost in the shop, you will get an even bigger 6X XP boost!
detailed_description:
This is Paint Warfare's biggest and most epic bundle of skins and rewards in a single DLC

You get:

  • The OG Banana Costume (customisable with your own hats)
  • Large Australian Bucket Hat
  • Permanent Double XP for EVERYONE including you in your lobby
  • Red and Black player name colors
  • Exclusive carbon-fibre weapon skin for the:
    • AK
    • Falcon
    • ACR
    • Launcher
    • Frenzy
    • Banana Gun
  • This DLC has been updated multiple times with even more features. By buying this DLC you own it forever, and that means you get all future perks with it too!


*TIP: The permanent double XP boost will also stack with the triple XP boost in the Shop. This means that if you have this DLC, and then activate a triple XP boost in the shop, you will get an even bigger 6X XP boost!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Ubuntu, SteamOS
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
